reviewText: THERE WAS NOTHING WRONG WITH THE CD WAS MADE BUT ACTULLEY I WAS LOOKING FOR SOMETHING MORE ADVANCE . SO THAT'S WHY

This video is fantastic. I have both Joyous Laughter vol. 1 and vol. 2, and they were actually the reason that I pursued learning to belly dance. Michelle's down-to-earth, encouraging and highly-skilled instruction make this new volume essential for dancers who are advanced and looking enhance their overall dance and daily practice. The three beautiful full-costume performances present dynamic examples of energy, skill, emotion and inspire creativity.
I can't believe how easy this instructor makes learning advanced moves! I really got it...If she can teach me she can teach ANYONE!
